unnormalised: The big buzz right now revolves around rumours of young cricketer Rohan Sharma potentially moving from the Delhi Daredevils to the Mumbai Indians. Some analysts are saying it’s too much, pointing to his inconsistent performance in the recent Ranji Trophy season. Others believe his raw talent and potential marketability, especially in Mumbai, justify the price tag. This feels like a real Bollywood drama unfolding before our eyes!
